 Publikationen von Mitarbeitern des SCC  
„Demographic and Treatment Variables In fluencing Outcome  for Localized 
Paratesticular Rhabdomyosarcoma: Results  From a Pooled Analysis of North 
American and European  Cooperative Groups “ 
Journal of Clinical Onc ology ascopubs.org/doi/10.1200/JCO.2018.78.9388  
Autoren sind: David O.Walterhouse, Donald A. Barkauskas, David Hall, Andrea  Ferrari, Gian 
Luca De Salvo, Ewa Koscielniak,  Michael C.G. Stevens, H elene Martelli, Guido Seitz, David A. 
Rodeberg, Margarett Shnorhavorian, Roshni  Dasgupta, John C. Breneman, James R. 
Anderson, Christophe Bergeron, Gianni Bisogno, William H. Meyer,  Douglas S. Hawk ins,  
Veronique Minard -Colin
